/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in vibrant hues of red and blue. These buildings are adorned with colorful banners and flags, adding a festive touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the street, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. Despite the absence of text or discernible signs, the image paints a vivid picture of daily life in Beijing.
